page.title: 10THE CASH & CARRY
page.content: { Norman's}is a large cash and carry in Withington. The total area is 16,000 sq.ft. 7,000 sq.ft. are taken up by storage space. They get most of their stock from their central depot in Exeter. One thing that attracts customers is the easy parking and low prices. Norman's is well laid out, ideal for doing the week's shopping. There is a lot of fire-foghting equipment and the place is well organised. Norman's chain of shops started in 1970, when it was called "Meadow Market." At the moment the store in Withington is the most northerly, one is planned to open in Birmingham soon. All kinds of goods, from crisps to garden equipment, are sold.
